short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower Your Streams with AI-powered Chat Insights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your stream with real-time analysis of your chat!  This extension leverages AI to monitor your live chat and provide you with:

- Quick summaries: Get a clear understanding of chat sentiment and key topics.
- Audience insights: Gauge your viewers' morale and engagement levels.
- Actionable information: Make informed decisions to keep your audience entertained.
- Take your stream to the next level!  Install this extension and unlock the power of AI-driven audience analysis.

Available for use on your favorite streaming platforms including Twitch, YouTube, and StreamYard!
